text:
Thank you to the people of Utah Second Congressional District for the honor and privilege of representing you these last eleven years. 

God bless you all.  And God bless the United States of America. 🇺🇸
We are in a critical fight for our nation and our freedom. And this fight grows intense. But because of good people, I have faith in our future.

All of these things have made me a better person. But the one thing I learned that matters above all is the goodness of the American people. The goodness of the people in Utah. It has reaffirmed my faith in humanity, and God, and our future.

Seeing conservation efforts in Africa. A cattle drive in central Utah. Talking w young people in schools.  Sitting in meetings at the White House.  Learning about leadership and management and delegation.

Being in Moscow and seeing the animosity of Russian leadership. Being in western China and seeing the oppression of the Uyghur people. Traveling to our allies around the world; Australia, Europe, Africa, Asia, all of these nations that want the US to lead and hope we will lead.
The list was long.

As I sat on the airplane last night, flying home from DC for the last time as a Member of Congress, I started to think about this amazing experience, the incredible people I have meet, and the things I have learned. I started to write them down and continued for about 3 hours.
Thank you @SenatorRomney for your dedicated public service to our state and to the country. I wish you and Ann all the best.

There are clearly two standards of justice in our nation: one for people named Biden or Clinton and one for everyone else.

I stand with President Trump against this brazen weaponization of our legal system.

These charges are equally unprecedented and unconscionable. This is a sad day for any American who believes in the rule of law.

The National Archives have confirmed that every single president since Ronald Reagan has mishandled classified materials.

It's been one of the great honors of my life to represent Utah in the People's House.

God bless you all, and God bless America.

President Lincoln once reminded us that we can only honor our fallen by rededicating ourselves to the cause for which they made the ultimate sacrifice.

I invite everyone to join me in remembering our heroes and thanking them for our way of life: strong and free and proud.

Government should work for you, not against you.

It will take years of hard, honest work to undo the damage done by partisan FBI leadership.

But the Republican majority will right this wrong.

The FBI is intimidating brave whistleblowers who are sticking out their necks to tell the truth.

This isn't just a few bad apples in the Bureau. This is a cultural rot.
This weaponization of our government is one of the most terrifying things I've seen during my time in Congress.

The Durham report is the latest piece of evidence that confirms what many of us have seen clearly for years...

The FBI was weaponized for political purposes.

The partisan leadership at the FBI and DOJ are directly responsible for immeasurable damage to our democracy.

We will hold them accountable.

The Russia collusion fabrication is a scar on our Democracy.

It will take years of honest work to undo the damage, but House Republicans will demand accountability.
To my dear mother, to my wife who is the mother of our six children, and to every mom out there: Happy Mother's Day!

.@HouseGOP just passed the strongest border security bill this country has ever seen.

We need to end the humanitarian and national security crisis at our southern border.

The Biden family set up a web of nearly 20 shell companies while Joe Biden was VP.

Why? To receive millions of foreign dollars that ultimately landed in Biden family accounts.

It looks like their main family business is influence peddling.

𝗕𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗻: no plan for the debt ceiling

𝗚𝗢𝗣: passed our debt plan last month

𝗕𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗻: no plan for the end of Title 42

𝗚𝗢𝗣: passing our border plan this week

.@POTUS needs to stop gaslighting the American people and start working for them.

House Democrats aren't clueless on the border.

It's worse than that.

This chaos seems to be their intention.
Why is so much of the mainstream media ignoring the Hunter Biden story?

.@POTUS continues to pledge his full support to Ukraine "for as long as it takes."

This abstract commitment begs the question: For as long as it takes to do what?

Read my @FoxNews op-ed on why the time has come to shift strategy and set clear goals.

foxnews.com/opinion/met-zele…

Republicans passed our debt plan last night.

Now it's time for Democrats to do their job.

If @POTUS won't negotiate with the People's House, the burden of default is on him.

The @HouseGOP debt plan:

✔ 𝗟𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁 federal spending
✔ 𝗦𝗮𝘃𝗲 taxpayer money
✔ 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘄 the economy

This is a win for the American people.

Senator Biden voted 10 times against raising the debt ceiling.

Vice President Biden criticized House Democrats for not compromising on the debt ceiling.

President Biden should take his own advice.

House Republicans just want reasonable negotiations.

A reasonable President would meet us halfway.

𝗣𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗕𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗻: "Our economic plan is working."

𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆: Americans have received a pay cut for 24 consecutive months - the longest streak in American history.

America needs more responsible policy out of the White House, not more gaslighting.

One thing is for sure: mental health is not a partisan issue in Washington.

It was great to stand alongside my friend from across the aisle, @RepMoulton, and discuss our work to fight America's mental health crisis.

We're making progress, but the fight is far from over!

Intelligence leaks have serious battlefield consequences.

The FBI and DOJ should be embarrassed. @HouseGOP will demand accountability.

We have countless protections for our children in the physical world — car seats, seat belts, and minimum ages for drinking, driving and more.

The damage to Gen Z from social media is undeniable — so why are there no protections in the digital world?

washingtonpost.com/opinions/…

President Macron expects the U.S. to lead the fight in Ukraine - his own backyard - but wants nothing to do with Taiwan?

No one wants another crisis, but preventing one requires a credible deterrent - a lesson he should have learned when Russian boots hit Ukrainian soil.
We need to hold our European allies responsible for securing their own backyard.

I'm proud of our major role in Ukraine's success against Russian aggression.

But, when I met with President Zelensky, I felt compelled to share with him some of my concerns.

We cannot afford - militaristically or economically - to continue sending taxpayer money to Ukraine.
From my family to yours, Happy Easter!

Ukraine’s stand against Russian aggression - and its stand for freedom - has inspired us all.

It was an honor to visit Kyiv and meet with Ukrainian President @ZelenskyyUa, and it was an honor to see their remarkable efforts first-hand.

The first indictment of a former U.S. President is a sad day for America.

This is what happens when hate succeeds reason.

Any fair-minded person can see this for what it is: the political weaponization of our legal system.

The so-called Inflation Reduction Act is living up to its ironic name.

A new report projects that it'll cost $1.2 trillion—more than three times what President Biden claimed.

Last week, @mtaibbi testified before Congress on the weaponization of the federal government.

During those few hours, he received an unannounced home visit from the IRS.

Does anyone seriously think that's a coincidence?
America can't afford any more of President Biden's economic policy: print money, spend money, repeat.

I joined @HARRISFAULKNER to put President Biden's spending spree in perspective:

The Biden Agenda ➡ $12 trillion
World War II ➡ $4.9 trillion
Veterans Benefits (1962-2020) ➡ $2.9 trillion

The bill is coming due, and the taxpayer will have to foot it.

This week, @HouseGOP is voting on the Lower Energy Costs Act.

It will cut regulations for American energy producers and cut costs for the American people.

We're keeping our promise to make America energy independent again.

Parents should always have a seat at the table when it comes to their child's education.

Today, @HouseGOP guaranteed that fundamental right.

#CommitmentToAmerica 🇺🇸

Xi Jinping and Vladimir Putin met this week to cement their new Axis of Evil.

Compare that scene to President Biden's budget, which prioritizes the welfare state over national security.

He must do more to protect Americans from the world's threats.

wsj.com/articles/joe-biden-d…
Why is our government only ever weaponized against Republicans?

The American people are losing faith in the Intelligence Community, and who can blame them?

FISA is an important tool, but it should never violate the rights of our citizens.

I'm proud to be part of the bipartisan @HouseIntel team to right this wrong.

foxnews.com/politics/house-i…

My father served in the Air Force. Five of my brothers served in the military. I spent 14 years in the military.

I love the Air Force. But I won't defend the Air Force when it turns on its own great servicemen and women.

My proudest years were spent defending our great nation in the Air Force.

It’s a shame to see this sacred branch of our government weaponized, but we will right this wrong.

@JudiciaryGOP will demand accountability to you, The People.

dailywire.com/news/weaponiza…

President Biden's budget reveals his real priority: Tax hikes.

@HouseGOP won't let it pass the House, and we won't let him raise your taxes.

President Biden has the same solution for every problem: more taxing and more spending.

It's an economic fairy tale with a scary ending...his proposed budget is no different.

The American people deserve the whole truth.

The Senate and the People's House both agree.

So why won't @POTUS declassify COVID-19 origin intel?

deseret.com/2023/3/14/236378…

I always enjoy the opportunity to sit down with my constituents, and we had some fantastic conversations at this week’s town hall.

Thank you to everyone who came out in Salt Lake City!

There's never been a generation this depressed, anxious, and suicidal.

And there's no doubt about the root cause: social media.

Read my op-ed with @GovCox about how we're giving our nation’s kids the protections they so desperately need ⬇ 

deseret.com/opinion/2023/3/1…

Joe Biden’s White House tried to contract out suppression of speech.

.@Weaponization will hold them accountable.

Private companies can deplatform whoever they want.

The federal government cannot, and this administration is no exception.

.@elonmusk bought Twitter last year and reoriented the company around free speech.

The FTC has since made over 350 demands of him, including possession of every single internal Twitter email about Mr. Musk.

This isn't a coincidence. It's harassment from Joe Biden's government.

The entire Farmington community - my beloved hometown - is in my prayers.

I have spoken with the mayor and chief of police, and I’ve encouraged them to as soon as possible release as much information as possible.

Our hearts go out to the Allan family.

I've been saying for years that COVID-19 almost certainly leaked from a lab in China.

Any serious person has been saying the same.

So why did @POTUS and Dr. Fauci fight that reality for so long?

The American people deserve answers, and @HouseGOP is committed to getting them.

It was great to see first-hand the critical work being done at Wheeler Army Airfield as part of my @BPC_Bipartisan Congressional exchange with @RepEdCase. 

There’s no doubt: Republicans and Democrats are committed to ensuring our military remains the world’s most powerful.
President Biden needs to be honest and direct with the American people.

Today the White House briefed the House and Senate on U.S. forces shooting down 4 objects in the last two weeks.

But why hasn’t President Biden briefed the American people yet?

There has never been a generation this depressed, anxious, and suicidal – it’s our responsibility to protect them from the root cause: social media.

This is a huge step toward giving our kids the protection they so desperately need.
.@HouseGOP and @Weaponization are keeping our promise to create a government that’s accountable to you, the People.

The @Weaponization Committee isn’t trying to go after the FBI. 

We’re trying to save it.

Does the FBI think that 17 omissions and over 50 false assertions in one single FISA application - particularly regarding a then-sitting president - is acceptable?

I still don’t know…
I have a bill that does just this. Let’s work together to protect our kids.

Read my full response to President Biden's State of the Union address ⬇️

This administration’s policy has left our economy uncertain, our military weakened, and our adversaries emboldened.

That’s why Americans elected a new Republican majority.

And I believe this divided Congress can be an opportunity to make bipartisan progress.

Beijing's ambitions are global, and the U.S. homeland is vulnerable.

@POTUS, it's your job to demonstrate to President Xi that he can't violate U.S. sovereign territory without consequences.
The balloon never should have been allowed to loiter over American soil for one second.

More than 40% of teens say they struggle with feelings of sadness or hopelessness.

More than 50% of parents are concerned about their children’s mental well-being.

This is a national crisis. That’s why I introduced a bill to ban social media for kids under the age of 16.

We have countless protections for our children in the physical world – a legal minimum age for drinking, driving and more.

The damage to Gen Z from social media is undeniable – so why are there no protections in the digital world?

For the sake of our kids, it's time to act.

"We must hold social-media companies accountable for the experiment they are running on our children for profit." -@POTUS

"I believe that 13 is too early [for social media]." -@Surgeon_General

I completely agree. Let's get to work and protect our kids.

There has never been a generation this depressed, anxious, and suicidal. It's our responsibility to protect them from the root cause: social media.

That's why I introduced a bill to ban social media for kids under the age of 16.
Does President Biden really believe there is no waste in government? There's no place we can find savings for the American people?

I know from experience: classified documents aren't the type of thing you just forget around the house.

Congress must start holding the Executive Branch accountable for their mishandling of these documents. They can't be so casual with our national security.

This is why so many people don’t trust public education: arrogant teachers who think they know better than parents.

And this is why nobody should be surprised that Utah gave parents the ability to choose with school vouchers.

We will always fight for the rights of our parents.

1. Defense
2. Interior, Environment, and related agencies
3. State, Foreign Operations, and related programs

Now let's get to work!

Don't miss my first tele-town hall of the year!

Dial 833-380-0518 tonight at 6:00pm MT to participate in our conversation about what we hope to accomplish in the new Congress. I look forward to hearing from you!
It’s my honor to serve on the Select Subcommittee on the Weaponization of the Federal Government. Read my full statement:

The work being done on @HouseIntel has never been more important as our adversaries in Moscow, Tehran, and Beijing try to expand their power and spheres of influence.

I’m grateful to continue my service on this committee to help ensure America’s national security.

It's impossible to know the threat, if any, to national security without knowing the contents of President Biden's classified documents.

But he should certainly regret leaving them next to his Corvette...
Tune in now to @D2KSL on @kslnewsradio!

It was a privilege to visit @UUtah this morning and speak with such a great group of students.

We talked about the critical issues facing their generation, from the national debt to social media and mental health. We have a lot of work to do, but I know we can do it together.

We protect our kids from drugs, alcohol, and all sorts of things. And there’s no question about the tragic effect that social media has on a child’s mental health.

It’s time we move to protect them once again.

The debt has risen by about $4 trillion in just two years.

It's no coincidence that inflation also recently climbed to a 40-year high – costing the average American family nearly $4,000 in real take-home pay.

The time to rein in spending and debt is now.
House Republicans are keeping our commitment to make Congress and the White House more accountable to you.

I spoke with @margbrennan on @FaceTheNation this Sunday about the debt ceiling.

Nobody wants a government shutdown, but we can't keep endlessly spending taxpayer money. Hopefully @POTUS and House Democrats recognize that reality and come to the negotiation table.

Today, we celebrate a great American. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr’s legacy of service, courage, and sacrifice changed the course of history forever.

May we always pursue the better nation he imagined for us all: one of freedom, equality, and opportunity for all.

🚨 COMING UP: I’m joining @margbrennan on @FaceTheNation to talk about the classified documents found at President Biden’s home and much more.

We are wholeheartedly committed to finding real-world, bipartisan solutions to help all Americans struggling with mental health challenges. And we will work tirelessly to uphold that commitment.

She's done outstanding work to elevate the conversation around mental health, and I'm eager to join her efforts on this all-important issue.
Congratulations, @RepBlakeMoore! It’s never been more important to reign in Washington spending, and Utah’s lucky to have a representative on this crucial committee.

I couldn’t agree more. Thank you for making this a priority, @SpencerJCox.

More to come from me on this issue from a federal level - stay tuned!

.@SpeakerMcCarthy and House Republicans made a Commitment to America, and we intend to honor it.

Accountability is coming.

We can't prevent a future catastrophe if we still don't fully understand the first one.

The American people deserve answers about the origin of a virus that turned our world upside down.
Let’s get to work!

Speaker McCarthy made a Commitment to America: to deliver an economy that's strong, a nation that's safe, a future that's built on freedom, and a government that's accountable.

We look forward to making that commitment a reality and getting this nation back on track.

Nothing is going to come easy in his new role, but he understands the significance it holds.

We face a Democrat Party and President who continue to move left - it’s essential that we check the radical policy that Congress has produced for the past two years.

Our country is fortunate that Kevin McCarthy stepped up to lead. He knows the job he’s walking into is tough.

But Speaker McCarthy knows what it means to work hard. He knows what it means to set substantial, conservative goals. And he knows what it means to achieve them too.

Joining @CNN with @jaketapper to talk about the Speaker vote and my continued support for @GOPLeader.

They’ve been given virtually everything they’ve ask for.

It’s nothing more than unserious lawmakers holding up serious work.

This is truly heartbreaking. Please join me in praying for the entire Enoch community.

ksl.com/article/50551135/thi…

A small group of egotistical members are currently holding up the House Speaker vote.

But they have no candidate. They have no consensus. And they have no goal.

Don't buy their empty rhetoric about "draining the swamp." They just want fifteen minutes of fame.
🌹Let’s go UTAH!🌹

Happy New Year!

The People’s House is eager to uphold our Commitment to America and deliver an economy that’s strong, a nation that’s safe, a future that’s built on freedom, and a government that’s accountable to 𝙮𝙤𝙪.
